text: Jean Beaudin (6 February 1939 – 18 May 2019) was a Canadian movie director and screenwriter. He directed 20 movies, including French-language movies J.A. Martin Photographer (1977), The Alley Cat (1985), Being at Home with Claude (1992) and The Collector (2002). He was born in Montreal, Quebec. Beaudin's partner of more than 20 years was actress Domini Blythe (1947–2010). Beaudin died on 18 May 2019, at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Canadian movie directors Category:Canadian movie producers Category:Canadian screenwriters Category:Writers from Montreal
title: Jean Beaudin
